ask_opus.description: Ask question using high intelligence Claude Opus model. Opus has web search built-in, but it only has read filesystem access.

question.description: Ask a brief question referring sourcecode files or create a file in `briefs` dir with more detailed instructions and tell Opus to read it.

quick_coder.description: Delegate trivial coder tasks to this coder agent. It is highly recommended to use this command for quick and simple coding tasks.

message.description: Provide simple instructions in message or create a file in `briefs` dir with more detailed instructions and tell coder to read it.

tester.description: Ask tester to run tests or to run a build. Tester has only read filesystem access. Tester is able to run: lint, unit tests, integration tests, build.

message.description: A message to ask. Feel free to create a file in `briefs` dir with more detailed instructions and tell tester to read it.
